casebody.data:
2001-3269 (La. 10/25/02)

STATE ex rel. Larry COVINGTON v. STATE of Louisiana. No. 2001-KH-3269. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 25, 2002.

In re Covington, Larry;—Plaintiff; Applying for Supervisory and/or Remedial Writs, Parish of Orleans, Criminal District Court Div. E, No. 342-268; to the Court of Appeal, Fourth Circuit, No. 91-K-0624.

Denied.
